title: In Times of Violence
description: A sheltered teenager becomes a member of a biker's gang called The Tyrants. While in London, she experiences a totally different life, one where she's happy and feels she has a family. For the first time in her life, she receives respect and love. Only after a disturbing awakening, she is forced to defend herself, her name, and her title. Jade has yet to discover the price she has to pay to live...in "Times of Violence".
author: Karina Kantas
